name: Cenchris contortrix
Relationship: Compare: Ars.; Laches. Clotho Arictans - Puff Adder. Should have a great sphere of usefulness in many conditions where excessive swelling in leading feature. (John H. Clarke, M.D.)

Heart: Feels distended, fills whole chest, as if it fell down in abdomen; sharp stitches, fluttering under left scapula
Head: Swelling around eyes, aching and itching in eyes
Aching pain in left frontal eminence and left side of teeth
Forgetful, absent-minded, alternating moods
Modalities: Worse: pressure; lying down; afternoon and night

details: Like the other snake poisons, it affects the system profoundly. Like arsenic, it has dyspnoea, mental and physical restlessness, thirst for small quantities of water, necessity for having clothing loose, like Laches. Marked alteration of moods; vivid dreams. Is a wonderful restorative and deep acting remedy. Increased sexual desire in both sexes. Ineffectual attempts to recline. Right ovarian region painful.
